title: Dumb Martian
description:
Novelette published in Galaxy Science Fiction (July 1952).
Blurb: "When Duncan took Lellie for company he knew it might help preserve his sanity. But what got him wasn't the upkeep -- it was the cost!"
creator: John Wyndham
